name: Joey Arroyo Is...Aggressive
description:
<font size=10>*BRAND NEW and ON SALE FOR THE FIRST WEEK ONLY*</font>

This CD is the second of six releases for the "Joey Arroyo Is..." project. Each album in the project will delve into a specific concept or trait that makes up Joey Arroyo's musical persona. The goal of the "Is..." collection is to show how a musician can exercise their right to diversity while still provide a distinct and recognizable sound. This challenge will drive our creative abilities to lengths that our audience will appreciate and will develop an experience that will keep the music constantly flowing for the fans.

"Aggressive" is comprised of songs that span across many harder hitting genres. What was especially exciting about this album is that we weren't solely focusing on making it heavy, but rather trying to bring a more in your face angle to the Singer/Songwriter world. We took influences from Southern Rock all the way to Hardcore and Metal yet thoughtfully intertwined them with our soulful approach. The end result is an album that I believe really sets us apart from other artists of our style; A noticeably experimental record that stretches the capabilities of what is considered catchy.

name: Joey Arroyo Is...The Storyteller
description:
This CD is the first of six releases for the "Joey Arroyo Is..." project. Each album in the project will delve into a specific concept or trait that makes up Joey Arroyo's musical persona. The goal of the "Is..." collection is to show how an artist can exercise their right to diversity while still provide a distinct and recognizable sound. This Challenge will drive our creative abilities to lengths that our audience will appreciate and will develop an experience that will keep music constantly flowing to our fans.

"The Storyteller" consists of songs that, well, tell a story of course. What's ironic about storytelling is that it is likely much more personal than even an autobiography. They are often told to express the deepest emotions and experiences that the author finds are more comfortably expressed vicariously through the eyes of a fictional character. I believe that stories are even easier to put yourself in the character's shoes and learn something you may not have discovered about yourself before...So go discover something.

name: The Joey Arroyo Band at The Hard Rock Cafe
description:
Come rock out with The JAB at the famous Hard Rock Cafe in Phoenix, AZ. This is the first time that we're playing here so it should call for a good time. 

The Joey Arroyo Band
Seven of Nine
Jacob Tyler Lucas

Please keep in mind that in purchasing this ticket, NO item will be shipped to you. You simply need to show your ID at the door to get in.

name: The JAB opening for Jason Castro
description:
Yes, you all remember him as that dreamy blue eyed white kid with dreads from American Idol. And though American Idol has lost some of it's cool since then, there's no denying that Jason Castro has a legit voice.

We're stoked to be opening for him as we believe he was definitely one of the better contestants they had on that show.

You should therefore, be stoked too! :)

April 22nd
@ Chasers 7pm
$13 advance, $15 at the door
